meanings.definition: The quality of being lively and bold in speech or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her pertnesses in the classroom always kept the students engaged.
meanings.sent2: His pertnesses during the presentation impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's pertnesses towards the dog were quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The pertnesses of the waves crashing against the shore were invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The child's pertnesses at the party made him the center of attention.

meanings.definition: Instances of being saucy or impertinent.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's pertnesses on stage had the audience laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: She was reprimanded for her pertnesses towards her boss.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's pertnesses in mimicking the owner's voice were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The pertnesses of the squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder were quite bold.
meanings.sent5: His pertnesses in challenging authority often got him into trouble.
